meanings.definition: Having or showing a tendency to squint.
meanings.sent1: She is the squintiest person I know, always narrowing her eyes in the sun.
meanings.sent2: The squintiest cat in the neighborhood always looks like it's trying to read tiny print.
meanings.sent3: The squintiest squirrel in the park tried to find its acorn stash but kept missing the spot.
meanings.sent4: His squintiest expression made him appear as if he could see through walls.
meanings.sent5: The squintiest detective in town never missed a clue, catching even the tiniest details.

meanings.sent1: Among all the squinty kids, she was known as the squintiest of them all.
meanings.sent2: The squintiest at the party was the one who could spot a hidden object from afar.
meanings.sent3: The squintiest of the group always won at 'spot the difference' games.
meanings.sent4: In the land of squinties, he was the squintiest ruler, seeing things others couldn't.
meanings.sent5: The squintiest in the family had a unique talent for finding lost items with just a glance.
